Uses of Package
control

  • Packages that use control 
    Package Description
    control
    This package is responsible to the response different actions in the game.
    gui
    This package will draw the total GUI of the game.
  • Classes in control used by control 
    Class and Description
    Control
    This class contains the main logic of the game.
    Food_Drink
    This class contains the handles the different objects of the game.
    Food_Drink.Food_Drinks_Type
    Contains the every possible object that the player has to catch.
    GameState
    This Calss contains every data releated to the game.
    GameState.Game_Control_Events
    Contains the possible event which could occure on the side of the player.
    GameState.Game_Difficulty
    Different game difficulties of the game.
    GameState.Game_Place
    Server or host mode of the multi game.
    GameState.Game_Type
    Contains every possible game mode.
    Player
    The player represents the object, which has to catch the different falling object.
    Position
    This class represents a normal position of an object in X,Y coordinate system.
    Stats
    This class contains every usefull information to store the different games
  • Classes in control used by gui 
    Class and Description
    Control
    This class contains the main logic of the game.
    GameState
    This Calss contains every data releated to the game.
